Description: Body fragment of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior streakily glazed with added white band; exterior, dull white slip: glazed at top; stopt maeander band above band with very worn added red band lined in white; below, animal frieze: goat to left; Xs as fill and worn added red.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.432)
